statements: SELECT * FROM voting_results;
SELECT voter_id, candidate_id FROM voting_results ORDER BY voter_id DESC;
SELECT voter_id, candidate_id FROM voting_results WHERE candidate_id = 1;
SELECT voter_id, COUNT(*) AS total_votes FROM voting_results GROUP BY voter_id;
SELECT voter_id, MAX(vote_timestamp) AS latest_vote_timestamp FROM voting_results GROUP BY voter_id ORDER BY latest_vote_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM voting_results WHERE voter_id = 1;
SELECT voter_id, candidate_id FROM voting_results WHERE candidate_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM voting_results WHERE vote_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
SELECT voter_id, COUNT(candidate_id) AS total_votes FROM voting_results GROUP BY voter_id;
SELECT voter_id, candidate_id FROM voting_results ORDER BY vote_timestamp DESC;
SELECT voter_id, candidate_id, vote_timestamp FROM voting_results WHERE voter_id = 123;
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation FROM candidates WHERE party_affiliation = 'Republican';
SELECT * FROM voting_results ORDER BY vote_timestamp DESC;
SELECT candidate_name FROM candidates WHERE candidate_id = 456;
SELECT voter_id, candidate_id FROM voting_results WHERE vote_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM voting_results WHERE voter_id = 123 AND candidate_id = 456;
SELECT candidate_id, candidate_name FROM candidates WHERE party_affiliation = 'Republican' ORDER BY candidate_name DESC;
SELECT voter_id, COUNT(voter_id) AS total_votes FROM voting_results GROUP BY voter_id HAVING COUNT(voter_id) > 5;
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation FROM candidates WHERE candidate_id IN (SELECT candidate_id FROM voting_results WHERE vote_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31');
SELECT * FROM candidates WHERE party_affiliation IS NOT NULL ORDER BY candidate_name ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM voting_results;
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation FROM candidates;
SELECT voter_id, candidate_id, vote_timestamp FROM voting_results ORDER BY vote_timestamp DESC;
SELECT candidate_name, total_votes, winner_percentage FROM candidates JOIN statistics ON candidates.candidate_id = statistics.winner_id;
SELECT candidate_id, count(candidate_id) as total_votes FROM voting_results GROUP BY candidate_id ORDER BY total_votes DESC;
SELECT * FROM voting_results WHERE voter_id = 1;
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation FROM candidates WHERE candidate_id = 2;
SELECT stat_id, total_votes, winner_id, winner_percentage FROM statistics;
SELECT voter_id, candidate_id, vote_timestamp FROM voting_results WHERE voter_id > 10 ORDER BY vote_timestamp DESC;

SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation, COUNT(*) AS total_votes FROM candidates JOIN voting_results ON candidates.candidate_id = voting_results.candidate_id GROUP BY candidate_name, party_affiliation;
SELECT * FROM voting_results ORDER BY vote_timestamp DESC;
SELECT candidate_name, COUNT(candidate_name) AS vote_count FROM voting_results GROUP BY candidate_name;
SELECT voter_name, voter_age, voter_location FROM voters WHERE voter_age >= 18;
SELECT * FROM candidates WHERE candidate_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT winning_candidate, total_votes FROM statistics ORDER BY total_votes DESC;
SELECT candidate_name, vote_timestamp FROM voting_results WHERE voter_id = 1 ORDER BY vote_timestamp DESC;
SELECT voter_name, voter_age, voter_location FROM voters WHERE voter_age > 18 AND voter_location = 'New York';
SELECT candidate_name, COUNT(*) AS total_votes FROM voting_results GROUP BY candidate_name ORDER BY total_votes DESC;
SELECT candidate_name, voter_name, total_votes FROM candidates c INNER JOIN voting_results v ON c.candidate_name = v.candidate_name LEFT JOIN statistics s ON c.candidate_name = s.winning_candidate;
SELECT * FROM statistics WHERE total_votes > 100 AND total_voters > 50 ORDER BY total_votes DESC, total_voters ASC;
SELECT * FROM VotingResults ORDER BY voter_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation FROM Candidates WHERE party_affiliation = 'Independent';
SELECT party_name, party_leader FROM Parties WHERE party_leader LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT voter_id, vote_timestamp FROM VotingResults WHERE voter_id < 1000;
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation, candidate_id FROM Candidates WHERE candidate_name LIKE '%Johnson%' ORDER BY candidate_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM VotingResults WHERE voter_id = 123;
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation FROM Candidates WHERE candidate_id = 5;
SELECT party_name, party_leader FROM Parties WHERE party_id = 2;
SELECT voter_id, candidate_id, vote_timestamp FROM Votes WHERE vote_id = 10;
SELECT total_votes, total_candidates, total_parties FROM Statistics WHERE stats_id = 1;
